history.narrative: Law 9-55 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-295. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 17, 1991, and October 1, 1991, respectively. Vetoed by the Mayor on November 1, 1991, it was reenacted, following council’s override of the Mayor’s veto on November 5, 1991, and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
